data.prayer: Lord of the Harvest, please send out workers into the the county of Karnal, Haryana, India.
data.verse: Then he said to his disciples, “The harvest is plentiful but the workers are few. Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Karnal, Haryana, India

data.prayer: Father, may the churches in Karnal, Haryana, India honor local leaders who work hard for the flock of God.
data.verse: Pay careful attention to yourselves and to all the flock, in which the Holy Spirit has made you overseers, to care for the church of God, which he obtained with his own blood.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 90 lost neighbors

data.prayer: the county of Karnal has (about) 16,558 people who know Jesus, 18,264 people who know about him culturally, and 1,470,477 people who are far from Jesus.
Spirit, inspire new kinds of evangelism through social media in Karnal, Haryana, India.
data.verse: But you, keep your head in all situations, endure hardship, do the work of an evangelist, discharge all the duties of your ministry.

data.prayer: Father, I pray against the principalities, against the powers, against the world’s rulers of darkness of this age, and against the spiritual forces of the wickedness in the heavenly places that are warring against the Jat Johal people.

Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Karnal, Haryana, India. Show them that faithfulness is more important than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.
Father, show your mercy on the 1,488,741 people in Karnal who are far from you. Please add 301 new house churches this year.
Father, for all those you call to look after your flock from the 16,558 believers in Karnal, please, make them passionate about hearing your Word.
data.verse: Therefore, you shepherds, hear the word of the LORD.

location.name: Karnal
location.people_groups_list: Jat Mahil (Sikh traditions), Brahmin Sankliwal, Khati (Hindu traditions), Brahmin Pushkarna, Bhabra (Hindu traditions)
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Jat Mahil (Sikh traditions) (5,900), Brahmin Sankliwal (49,000), Khati (Hindu traditions) (1,630,000), Brahmin Pushkarna (74,000), Bhabra (Hindu traditions) (40,000)
